CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to the "Specify..." command in Edit > Selection menu, that allow to create a new rectangular ROI by its coordinates.
# Create new ROI # Get current ImagePlus image = WindowManager.getCurrentImage() # Enter ROI coordinates width = 50 height = 50 x_ROI = 100 # ROI center y_ROI = 100 # ROI center oval = False # Set to True to get an oval ROI # Make it x1 = int(x_ROI - (width/2)) y1 = int(y_ROI - (height/2)) if oval: roi = OvalRoi(x1, y1, width, height); else: roi = Roi(x1, y1, width, height); image.setRoi(roi);
